text: pas jo kuraan hamane tumhaaree taraph naazil kiya hai agar usake baare mein tum ko kuchh shaq ho to jo log tum se pahale se kitaab (khuda) padha karate hain un se poochh ke dekhon tumhaare paas yaqeenan tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se barahaq kitaab aa chukee to too na haragiz shaq karane vaalon se hona
